item.title: Triumph Speed 400 Price in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Q: What is the on road price of Triumph Speed 400 in Raichur?
The on road price of Triumph Speed 400 in Raichur is ₹ 2,98,529. This includes RTO charges of ₹ 43,576 and insurance cost of ₹ 20,699....]]>

item.title: Jawa 42 FJ Price in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[I’ve spent a few months with the Jawa 42, and while it certainly turns heads with its retro-modern styling, I can’t help but feel that the features don’t quite justify the price tag.Pros:Design: The bike looks stunning. The matte finish, minimalist branding, and sporty stance give it a unique identity.Engine Performance: The 293cc liquid-cooled engine offers decent torque and smooth cruising, especially on highways.Ride Quality: Suspension setup is comfortable for city rides, and the low seat he...]]>

item.title: Royal Enfield Continental GT 650 Price in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[Buying the Continental GT 650 was a dream come true. The entire experience — from test ride to delivery — was smooth and exciting. The bike’s classic café racer design and chrome finish attract attention everywhere I go. I’ve ridden over 8,000 km in and around Bangalore, and every ride feels special.The 648 cc twin engine is incredibly refined with a deep, satisfying exhaust note. Power delivery is smooth, gear shifts are precise, and it cruises effortlessly at 100 km/h. The handling is sharp, g...]]>
